name: Oversized Tailored Blazer
attributes: 90% POLYESTER 10% ELASTANE. MODEL WEARS SIZE 10
desc: A menswear classic with a feminine edge, add a touch of soft tailoring to your wardrobe with a blazer. Resembling a suit jacket but cut more casually for an effortlessly chic look, blazers are the trans-seasonal piece you need. Featuring lapels and button detailing, we've got blazers for women who wanna bring a new kinda energy to their outfits. Team a double-breasted blazer with some heel boots, or get on board with the oversized trend and go for longline pieces for an edgy vibe.

This cape coat is about to become your new throw-on-and-go piece, whether you're loving black capes or timeless white designs.

With long sleeves and a tailored finish, a plus size longline blazer is our new season obsession to wear with matching trousers and statement heels. Whether you want an iconic black blazer or want to serve attitude in printed styles, our full collection of plus size women's blazers has it all.

name: Abstract Print Tailored Blazer
attributes: 90% Polyester and 10% Elastane. Machine Washable. Model Wears UK Size 10.
desc: A menswear classic with a feminine edge, add a touch of soft tailoring to your wardrobe with a blazer. Resembling a suit jacket but cut more casually for an effortlessly chic look, blazers are the trans-seasonal piece you need. Featuring lapels and button detailing, we've got blazers for women who wanna bring a new kinda energy to their outfits. Team a double-breasted blazer with some heel boots, or get on board with the oversized trend and go for longline pieces for an edgy vibe.

desc: Finding the perfect fit isn’t always easy. Dress your curves the right way and get the support you need this summer with our fuller bust swimwear, designed especially for DD+ busts. Bring the heat in a fuller bust bikini or keep it casual in fuller bust floral styles. Just add a floaty cover up, pretty sandals, and an oversized beach bag and you’re good to go. Whatever your style, find your perfect fit with boohoo’s fuller bust swimwear.

name: Tiger High Waisted Bikini Brief
desc: The high waisted bikini trend isn’t going anywhere anytime soon, and this one is no exception. A figure hugging, leg lengthening, and modest style that sits on the natural waist for a complimentary fit, this curve-smoothing style is everything your poolside vibe needs. From high waisted thong bikinis to tie-dye designs, tropical styles to snake print, we’ve got something for every kinda’ vibe. Pair this one with sky-high wedges and a floaty beach cover up and head in the direction of the nearest pool party.

attributes: 82% recycled polyester, 18% elastane. Model wears size UK 10.

name: Maldives Ruffle High Waisted Bikini Set
attributes: Model wears size UK 10. 85% Polyester, 15% Elastane. Hand wash.
desc: The high waisted bikini trend isn’t going anywhere anytime soon, and this one is no exception. A figure hugging, leg lengthening, and modest style that sits on the natural waist for a complimentary fit, this curve-smoothing style is everything your poolside vibe needs. From high waisted thong bikinis to tie-dye designs, tropical styles to snake print, we’ve got something for every kinda’ vibe. Pair this one with sky-high wedges and a floaty beach cover up and head in the direction of the nearest pool party.

name: Sustainable Crinkle Plunge Beach Playsuit
attributes: 100% Recycled Polyester. Machine Wash. Model wears UK Size 10.
desc: Summer styling has never been easier with beach playsuits & jumpsuits. Perfect for holidays, a beach playsuit or jumpsuit puts the sun into summer. This one-piece garment is cool, floaty, breathable and provides a simple last-minute outfit. Whether it’s a night of cocktails or an alfresco breakfast, it's the perfect piece for any type of holiday occasion. Plus, the material is quick-drying, making it ideal for easy beachwear.

name: Essentials Fuller Bust Recycled Bikini Top
attributes: 82% recycled polyester, 18% elastane. Model wears size UK 10.
desc: Finding the perfect fit isn’t always easy. Dress your curves the right way and get the support you need this summer with our fuller bust swimwear, designed especially for DD+ busts. Bring the heat in a fuller bust bikini or keep it casual in fuller bust floral styles. Just add a floaty cover up, pretty sandals, and an oversized beach bag and you’re good to go. Whatever your style, find your perfect fit with boohoo’s fuller bust swimwear.

name: Tall Ruffle Asymmetric Swimsuit
attributes: 95% Polyester 5% Elastane. Machine wash. Model wears UK size 10.
desc: Tired of swimsuits that don’t fit your body? Try out our range of tall swimwear. Designed for women 5’7” and over, our tall swimsuits and bikinis have extra fabric around the torso where necessary, and also come with a better overall fit. These are comfortable and practical, letting you feel confident and completely at ease. Add these to your cart, prepare your wardrobe for summer, but first, which way to the beach?
